snippet: British employers plan to hire staff at the fastest rate since the early days of the financial crisis, a business survey showed on Monday in a further sign the economy is picking up speed....

headline.print_headline: UK Employers Plan to Hire at Fastest Pace Since 2007-Report
headline.main: UK Employers Plan to Hire at Fastest Pace Since 2007-Report

lead_paragraph: British employers plan to hire staff at the fastest rate since the early days of the financial crisis, a business survey showed on Monday in a further sign the economy is picking up speed.
